author: Paul Kasabian
title: Ex-Cardinals Star Jim Edmonds Hospitalized, Undergoing Coronavirus Testing
description: Former  MLB  outfielder  Jim Edmonds , an eight-time Gold Glove winner and four-time All-Star who played from 1993-2010, revealed on Instagram that he has been hospitalized and is undergoing testing for COVID-19...
content:
Jeff Roberson/Associated Press
Former MLB outfielder Jim Edmonds, an eight-time Gold Glove winner and four-time All-Star who played from 1993-2010, revealed on Instagram that he has been hospitalized and is undergoing testing for COVID-19.
Derrick Goold of … [+1595 chars]
